dialogue.line: Cosmopolis, Center of the Universe
YOU did WHAT?!?!

I'm so glad you're safe but how does that even
HAPPEN!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
GRAVOBOT I AM SO PROUD OF YOU BUT
I JUST HAVE TO WONDER

WHO WOULD MAKE THAT KIND OF BUTTON!!!!!
ONE THAT WOULD BREAK THE WHOLE PLANET

AAAAA I CAN'T BELIEVE ANYONE WOULD BE SO
IRRESPONSIBLE WHO IS THIS HOOLIGAN I

AH! HELLO I MEAN Hello wonderful how are you
:)?

Are you......Talking about the planet.........
that you made me?

The what?! The planet?! Haha, what!!!
I don't know what you're talking about!!!!!

Well... Hum... You know... I know things...
about this universe... that we made together.....
Oh.

I know... that you tried very hard......
not to make a planet... Aha.....

But I also know... that you can be......
a little passionate... when it comes to me.....
Wah!!! She saw right through me!!!

I know... about everything......
And I know... that Gravobot... tried very hard.....

I know... that I'm very proud of Gravobot......
and... I love them.....

Thank you, Gravobot... for helping my silly wife......
For saving the planet she made for me.....
Thank you, my child.

And, my dear... You're very silly......
And you made many mistakes.....

You dragged poor Gravobot...
Into all of this.....

Oof... I really messed up this time.
I'm so sorry.

But... I know... you acted out of love...
And I forgive you.....
BABE!!!!

So I think... We all deserve... to have a bit of rest...
To enjoy these flowers... and each other.
I LOVE YOU!!!!
